title: can you stop flagging my stuff riot mate
body: trying to have conversations will fellow league players and you FLAG MY STFUFF, I have never been rude or offensive on the league forums and it's really rustling me jimmies that you guys have removed my comments, cheers.

replies.body:
What exactly are you posting? Are you able to quote it?

Not that I can do anything about it, I'm just curious as to what Riot thinks is inappropriate for the public but you do not.
